video.title: Virgin River
video.synopsis: Searching for a fresh start, a nurse practitioner moves from LA to a remote northern California town and is surprised by what -- and who -- she finds.

episodes.synopsis: When nurse practitioner Mel moves to a remote town in northern California looking for a new life, she's startled by the welcome she receives.
episodes.title: Carry On

episodes.synopsis: After finding an abandoned baby on Doc Mullins's doorstep, Mel and her boss argue over whether to call Social Services or find the newborn's mother.
episodes.title: Lost

episodes.synopsis: Mel considers being a temporary foster parent to Chloe while grappling with her own grief. Jack works to convince her to stay in Virgin River.
episodes.title: ... and Found

episodes.synopsis: Hope's health scare prompts a difficult conversation with Doc. Charmaine asks Mel uncomfortable questions. Paige keeps secrets.
episodes.title: A Wounded Heart

episodes.synopsis: Under pressure, Mel and Jack respond to a medical emergency on a remote illegal pot farm. Charmaine and Hope exchange words.
episodes.title: Under Fire

episodes.synopsis: Mel gets a surprise visitor just in time for the town's big dance party. Jack continues to suffer flashbacks from his time in the military.
episodes.title: Let's Mingle

episodes.synopsis: Preacher happens upon a secret. Mel's memories threaten to overwhelm her. Jack has a sincere talk with Charmaine about their relationship.
episodes.title: If Truth Be Told

episodes.synopsis: A storm causes a town power outage and everybody gets together at Jack's bar. Mel grapples with her revelation. Preacher investigates Paige.
episodes.title: Into the Light

episodes.synopsis: Hope urges Jack to read Charmaine's letter. Preacher confronts Paige with his new knowledge. Mel and Doc work together on a pressing case.
episodes.title: Everybody Has a Secret

episodes.synopsis: Charmaine tells a stunned Jack to make a decision while Mel is left reeling and Hope is filled with guilt. Meanwhile, Paige opens up to Preacher.
episodes.title: Unexpected Endings

episodes.synopsis: Jack asks Mel for help when Charmaine experiences a complication in her pregnancy. Hope insists that Doc keep their relationship a secret.
episodes.title: New Beginnings

episodes.synopsis: Despite Mel's efforts, Charmaine's stay at Hope's house gets off to a rocky start. A situation involving Paige's past intensifies unexpectedly.
episodes.title: Taken by Surprise

episodes.synopsis: Mel endeavors to help an uncooperative Charmaine get hydrated while thinking about what transpired with Jack. Calvin offers Brady a new job.
episodes.title: The Morning After

episodes.synopsis: The town attends the annual picnic where residents engage in friendly competition, romantic tiffs and —as far as Mel is concerned — too much gossip
episodes.title: Rumor Has It

episodes.synopsis: Jack's war memories haunt him when he reunites with his Marine friends. Mel struggles to handle conflict with her sister-in-law.
episodes.title: Can’t Let Go

episodes.synopsis: Mel grapples with how to honor Mark ahead of the anniversary of his death. Jack's stress leads him to  bad decisions. Hope apologizes with pie.
episodes.title: Out of the Past

episodes.synopsis: When police find a body in the woods, Preacher worries about the implications. Charmaine and Jack work on a birth plan with Mel.
episodes.title: Breaking Point

episodes.synopsis: While Jack helps Mike zero in on Calvin, Mel and Doc investigate a mysterious outbreak that could be related to food poisoning. Hope learns a secret.
episodes.title: Blindspots

episodes.synopsis: Mel searches desperately for Jack, who has stumbled upon disturbing news. Jamie makes Preacher an enticing job offer. Hope questions Doc's loyalty.
episodes.title: Hazards Ahead

episodes.synopsis: Mel tracks down Brady to find out more about Spencer. Hope answers Doc's question. Preacher makes a life-changing decision.
episodes.title: Blown Away

episodes.synopsis: Mel attempts to avoid celebrating her birthday while remembering the past. Doc confirms his troubling diagnosis and begins looking for his replacement.
episodes.title: Where There's Smoke...

episodes.synopsis: Ricky and Lizzie struggle to find privacy. Doc worries about Hope, who may be stuck in a hurricane. Mel offers Jack an enticing invitation.
episodes.title: Sticky Feet

episodes.synopsis: Lily divulges a devastating secret to Mel. Brie gets to know Brady better and admits something to Jack. Lizzie's ex surprises her.
episodes.title: Spare Parts and Broken Hearts

episodes.synopsis: Doc and Mel help Christopher and Preacher with a medical emergency. After an angry confrontation, Jack focuses his energy on a romantic gesture.
episodes.title: Take My Breath Away

episodes.synopsis: Mel is taken aback by Doc's news after they interview a new doctor. To Jack's chagrin, Todd makes a bold request. Lily makes a difficult revelation.
episodes.title: Kindling

episodes.synopsis: Jack and Mel argue about their relationship and their future while competing in the Lumberjack Games. Brie opens up about her painful breakup.
episodes.title: Jack and Jill

episodes.synopsis: Jack meets with a custody attorney and his stress begins to overwhelm him. Brady gets brought in for questioning. Muriel offers Doc advice.
episodes.title: Split

episodes.synopsis: Heartbroken, Mel heads to LA to support Joey at her divorce hearing. More of Jack's memories return. Lily asks her friends to care for her children.
episodes.title: Life and Death

episodes.synopsis: The town says goodbye to a dear friend. Brie suffers a loss of her own. Mel and Jack discuss what should happen with their relationship.
episodes.title: The Sun Also Rises

episodes.synopsis: Jack makes a momentous decision as Mel grapples with how to share surprising news. Doc is plagued with concern. Preacher meets with Paige's friend.
episodes.title: A Wedding, No Funeral and a Baby
